head.title: Minivan Jumps Curb And Kills Woman, 71

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York

hedline.hl1: Minivan Jumps Curb And Kills Woman, 71

abstract.p: Caritina Cardenas, pedestrian, is struck and killed by minivan driven by Jose Martino, Inwood section of Manhattan (S)

block.p: A 71-year-old Bronx woman was killed yesterday morning when a minivan jumped a curb and knocked her through a plate-glass store window in the Inwood section of Manhattan, the police said.

The police said the woman, Caritina Cardenas of 210 West 230th Street, was using a walker to travel down Broadway around 11:30 a.m. when she was hit by a van driven by Jose Martino, 48, who lives nearby.
A 71-year-old Bronx woman was killed yesterday morning when a minivan jumped a curb and knocked her through a plate-glass store window in the Inwood section of Manhattan, the police said.

The police said the woman, Caritina Cardenas of 210 West 230th Street, was using a walker to travel down Broadway around 11:30 a.m. when she was hit by a van driven by Jose Martino, 48, who lives nearby.
Mr. Martino is believed to have been trying to park the van when it jumped the curb and hit Mrs. Cardenas, propelling her through the window of Dichter's Rexall Drugs at 4943 Broadway.
The police planned to examine the van for mechanical failure.
